page.description: Checking this box creates rows with alternating colors. The Alternate row shading property comes with two additional properties, Even row band size and Odd row band size . The 'even' and 'odd' refer to the alternating colors. The number after each property indicates how many grid rows each color band encompasses. The default setting for both color bands is 1.
